actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources

official_title: To extend certain provisions of the Marine Mammal Protection Act.

summary.text: Amends the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to extend the termination date of the interim exemption regarding the incidental taking of marine mammals in the course of commercial fishing operations by persons using vessels of the United States and foreign vessels which have valid fishing permits.

titles.title: To extend certain provisions of the Marine Mammal Protection Act.
